text: Pacific Rim is a 2013 American science fiction monster movie. It was directed by Guillermo del Toro, and written by Toro and Travis Beacham. It was produced by Legendary Pictures and distributed by Warner Bros.. It was released on July 12, 2013. Critics gave it good reviews. They liked its special effects and action scenes. It made more than $384 million worldwide. ==Plot== In 2013, the Earth's cities are attacked by Kaiju, very large monsters who come from a portal on the floor of the Pacific Ocean. To battle them, the nations in the Pacific Rim build the Jaegars: very large robots piloted by two people whose brains are linked to the robots. This allows the pilots to control the robots using their mind, and the robots do the same actions that the pilots do. Although the Jaegars work well in killing the Kaiju, the attacks happen more often and are more powerful. By 2025, the governments of the Pacific Rim have ended the Jaegar project and build very large walls to protect humans from the Kaiju. Most of the film is set in this period, focusing on the war's later days. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:2013 action movies Category:2013 science fiction movies Category:2010s American action movies Category:2010s American adventure movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:2010s monster movies Category:Movies set in San Francisco Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Guillermo del Toro Category:Apocalyptic movies Category:Dystopian movies
title: Pacific Rim (movie)
